entry.title: Markdown 语法备注
entry.content:
备注：具体样式需要修改screen.css

Code and Syntax Highlighting

Code blocks are part of the Markdown spec, but syntax highlighting isn’t. However, many renderers – like Github’s and Markdown Here – support syntax highlighting.

代码段示例之一：

代码段示例：

def openFile(filepath){
    return File.open(filepath);
}

无序列表

  • Red
    • Red 1
    • Red 2
  • Green
  • Blue

有序列表

  1. Bird
    1. Ordered sub-list
    2. Ordered sub-list
  2. McHale
    1. Ordered sub-list
  3. Parish
    1. Ordered sub-list

这是外部链接：google

这是内部链接：关于

斜体字

强调

There is a literal backtick (`) here.

Use the printf() function.

分行线

表格

Colons can be used to align columns.

Tables Are Cool
col 3 is right-aligned $1600 |
col 2 is centered $12 |
zebra stripes are neat $1 |
